entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 31 with temperature rising to minus 24 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 31 with temperature rising to minus 24 by morning. Wind chill minus 40 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Near blizzard. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Near blizzard developing in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 22. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late in the evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 31 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Thursday 19 January 2023
